description: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that sharply boosts the Defense stat of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that sharply boosts the Speed stat of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that sharply boosts a Pokémon’s accuracy in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that can be used once to sharply boost the critical-hit ratio of a Pokémon in battle. This effect disappears if the Pokémon leaves the battle.
An item that prevents Pokémon on your side from having their stats lowered in battle for five turns.
